Lillian Dube (a mụrụ na 30 Septemba 1945) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa.  A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta Masebobe na ihe nkiri soap opera Generations
N'afọ 2007, a chọpụtara na Dube nwere ọrịa kansa ara ma na-ebelata site na afọ 2008.  Ọrịa kansa ahụ laghachiri ọzọ n'afọ 2015.
N'afọ 2017, e nyere Dube nzere doctorate na Drama na Film Production na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Tshwane
